Content: A group of students of Bandaranayake Central College in Veyangoda, together with three parents were facilitated to visit the Palaly Airport on request after they arrived in Jaffna on Tuesday (7). The request of those 13 A/L students received the blessings of the Commander, Security Forces - Jaffna (SF-J), Major General Darshana Hettiarachchi. Troops serving the airport area assisted them after welcoming them.
